channel.title: Night powers: Order of occurance and being converted
channel.description:
Hi All,
Currently when you are converted and investigated the same night, you will appear as evil to the investigator. This is obviously very frustrating to the newly converted as they will likely be outed right away and die.
As the game been tested if the order happens the other way? So that you appear as the allignment you started the night as rather than ended? This would be a boost to the evil side for sure. Would it be too much?
